name: Tale of Briburn
description:
The village of Briburn is a peaceful haven residing near a mystical forest. Until one day, a mage by the name of Xai'Thar discovered the village's hidden magic well and tries to take it for his own. You, brave adventurer, had tried to defeat him once before, but you were forced to retreat after a scathing loss.

After you heal up back at the village, you set out to fight him once more. However, one of the village members tells you to request the strength of the guardian forest spirits before you face off against Xai'Thar once more. Find the spirits and defeat the evil mage. The fate of Briburn is in your hands!

Movement keys: WASD to move, Space to shoot
